Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Thulsa's manipulated the wendigos and turned them against us. We have to kill them to secure our hold on the Vale of Spires.

Kill the dominated wendigo {@LinkCreature:51#1011#ragers}, {@LinkCreature:51#1021#warlords}, and {@LinkCreature:51#1031#shamans}.

Report to Kenzar at Icebase Defiance when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation! Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
